MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA7 postcode area of Runcorn, affecting properties in Leyton Close, Woodford Close and surrounding streets. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.57PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 6.26PM on 17th January 2021.
